scripts.db:diff: sh -c 'mkdir -p supabase/migrations && pnpm exec supabase db diff --use-migra --file supabase/migrations/$(date -u +%Y%m%d%H%M%S)_schema.sql'
scripts.db:link:staging: dotenv -e .env.local -- sh -c 'test -n "$SUPABASE_STAGING_PROJECT_REF" && pnpm exec supabase link --project-ref $SUPABASE_STAGING_PROJECT_REF || (echo "Missing SUPABASE_STAGING_PROJECT_REF" && exit 1)'
scripts.db:link:prod: dotenv -e .env.local -- sh -c 'test -n "$SUPABASE_PROD_PROJECT_REF" && pnpm exec supabase link --project-ref $SUPABASE_PROD_PROJECT_REF || (echo "Missing SUPABASE_PROD_PROJECT_REF" && exit 1)'
